title: Tunshi Xingkong Movie: Xueluo Dalu

synonyms: Tunshi Xingkong Juchang Ban: Xueluo Dalu, Swallowed Star Movie
alternative_titles.ja: 吞噬星空剧场版 血洛大陆

synopsis:
It's time for battle! It's time for excitement! It's time for thrills! "This trial has a 98% mortality rate." "Then... I'll eliminate everyone who threatens my life." Luo Feng travels to the Blood Continent for the trial to protect Earth. On this continent, he constantly pushes his limits, makes good friends and encounters powerful enemies, but he never retreats. Instead, he perseveres step by step, carrying the burden of his journey. Ultimately, he completes his infinite advancement, gaining the powerful ability to protect Earth.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
